mapper.insert: insert into ST_PPTN_R (ID, STCD, TM, DRP, INTV, PDR, DYP, WTH) values (#{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{STCD,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{TM,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{DRP,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{INTV,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{PDR,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{DYP,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{WTH,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ST_PPTN_R set STCD = #{STCD,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, TM = #{TM,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DRP = #{DRP,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INTV = #{INTV,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PDR = #{PDR,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DYP = #{DYP,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WTH = #{WTH,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, STCD, TM, DRP, INTV, PDR, DYP, WTH from ST_PPTN_R
